name: Dropdown Select
description: Dropdown select allows to select an item from the list and update the model.

options.name: model
options.description: A result of the selection. Two way data binding.

options.name: position
options.description: Vertical position of the dropdown list against the dropdown button. It becomes handy when dropdown floats to the right.

options.name: icon
options.description: Show icon to the left of the button text.

options.name: default-text
options.description: Default text shown before selection is made.
